accueil.description: Based in Sambava, the vanilla capital of the SAVA region, we share with the world the authentic taste and fragrance of Madagascar’s finest vanilla, grown with passion and expertise.

intro.paragraphe1: UNM was founded in 2016 in Sambava, Madagascar, by its founder and CEO LUO MING. Driven by passion, the company emerged with a unique mission: to share the exceptional taste and aroma of Madagascar vanilla across the globe.
intro.paragraphe2: In 2024, UNM reached a major milestone by exporting several tons of vanilla, providing stable income to around fifty workers during a particularly challenging year for Madagascar. Small but united, our team is above all a family, bonded by years of collaboration and a shared purpose.

quiSommesNous.citation: These commitments rely on a fully controlled value chain: from harvesting to international shipping, ensuring vanilla that is 100% traceable, safe, and sustainable.

piliers.description: Strict selection, controlled preparation, and export processes aligned with international standards: our vanilla meets the demands of the most discerning markets.
Our teams combine traditional methods with modern techniques to preserve the natural aroma, texture, and unique aromatic richness of Madagascar vanilla.
We value local work, ensure fair income, and contribute to the development of vanilla-producing communities.

etapes.description: Vanilla takes several years to develop. It usually takes 3 to 4 years after planting for the first flowers to appear.
Each flower is hand-pollinated. Growers use thin sticks to connect the male and female parts of the flower, a delicate process that takes only a few seconds per flower.
Nine months are required to obtain fully mature pods ready for harvest. Only the best—well-formed and perfectly ripe—continue to the next steps.
Blanching, sweating, sun-drying, then curing: a long process that reveals the characteristic aroma, color, and suppleness of premium vanilla.
Pods are graded, sorted, and packed according to international standards, then stored under optimal conditions for export.

services.intro: Driven by a genuine passion for vanilla, we master every post-harvest step—from green pod selection to export—so we can share authenticity, aromatic richness, and unique savoir-faire with our customers.
services.description: Whether you need three pods or several containers, we supply premium vanilla for everyone: consumers, food lovers, gourmet chefs, cosmetic brands, creative cooks, and agro-industry professionals.

etapes.texte: Plump, supple, and intensely fragrant pods, graded by lengths ranging from 15 to 20 cm. Often known as Gourmet and TK.
Carefully cut pieces of pods, ideal for infusions and preparations that require strong aromatic power at a controlled cost.
100% natural powder made from dried vanilla pods finely ground, ideal for seasoning pastries, ice creams, and beverages.
Pure vanilla seeds extracted from the pod, offering exceptional aromatic intensity for high-end culinary creations.

caracteristiques: Perfect suppleness: Bends without breaking, indicating ideal moisture and preserved freshness.
Plump and voluminous: Full, generous pods rich in seeds and aroma.
Length and uniformity: Generally 14 to 18 cm, with consistent sizing reflecting optimal maturation.
Intense and complex aroma: Rich, warm vanilla fragrance, highlighting the finesse of natural vanillin.
Impeccable appearance: Uniform dark-brown color, slightly glossy surface, no defects or cracks, visible seeds inside.
articles.info: Store away from heat and light, in an airtight container.

caracteristiques: Exceptionally intense aroma: Seeds rich in natural vanillin, offering a deep, warm, refined fragrance.
Fine and consistent texture: Black, shiny, uniform seeds, indicative of well-matured pods.
Perfect purity: Made exclusively from premium pods, with no added sugar, alcohol, or artificial flavoring.
Elegant and high-end appearance: Small black grains add a refined touch to desserts, pastries, and sauces.
Immediate aromatic power: Seeds release intense aroma instantly, even in small quantities.
articles.info: Ideal for fine pastry, ice creams, and gourmet infusions.

engagements.description: We are a passionate and skilled team, committed to producing and exporting superior-quality vanilla while respecting our partners and the environment. Our ambition is to be a responsible and recognized player in the industry, ensuring products that meet international standards, are fully traceable, and create sustainable impact.
articles: Integrity – We act with transparency and honesty in every decision.
Rigor – We apply high standards to ensure the quality of our commitments.
Human development – We encourage growth and fulfillment for every collaborator.
Environmental respect – We work to reduce our ecological impact and protect natural resources.
Sustainable partnerships – We build strong, responsible relationships to create long-term value in the vanilla industry.
